title: udayantha11
author: udayantha11
content: As per my experience, On 2018 Smart contract bubble came to altcoins , so all related to smart contract Alts became giants at that time. 2021 hot topic were Gaming,NFT ,Defi. I think for 2024/2025 hot topics will be " Web3.0 , AI, and Machine learning ". what is your thoughts?

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: It's very hard to say that. As far as i can see there was no new thing come to the crypto and it seems like the next bullish trend will always be related with the things that are still in the development progress like metaverse, web 3.0 and any other things that currently exist in the market. I don't even think you will be seeing the new thing to come very soon. Im still investing in the current tech that is still being developed

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: For me, DeFi, NFT, Play2Earn will still exist but with more improvement.For me, the gaming industry is on cryptocurrency. For me, what we have earlier or the start of gaming on cryptocurrency is not yet to the max, that's why I'm looking forward to it. eSports community is a huge and for sure, it's a big thing also in cryptocurrency.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on October 07, 2022, 08:26:43 AMFor me, DeFi, NFT, Play2Earn will still exist but with more improvement.For me, the gaming industry is on cryptocurrency. For me, what we have earlier or the start of gaming on cryptocurrency is not yet to the max, that's why I'm looking forward to it. eSports community is a huge and for sure, it's a big thing also in cryptocurrency.yes i also agree with this guy the defi of course will be there and keep improving gaming industry in blockchain is pretty early maybe it will be boom and really be played for everyone in 2025 the nft its already huge and maybe more real-world companies will start join in the layer 1 will keep improving after eth2 merge the pos era and the efficient blockchain is already here in the 2025 i think become mainstream to see people buy and sell using crypto since it will blazingly fast and cheap

comments.author: judaspriest
comments.body: Quote from: udayantha11 on October 07, 2022, 07:43:46 AMAs per my experience, On 2018 Smart contract bubble came to altcoins , so all related to smart contract Alts became giants at that time. 2021 hot topic were Gaming,NFT ,Defi. I think for 2024/2025 hot topics will be " Web3.0 , AI, and Machine learning ". what is your thoughts?your thinking is amazing, I don't think that AI will become hype in the next bull, because indeed AI in the crypto world is still not hype, especially in 2021 it is still around NFT, Metaverse and memecoin, this will be interesting if it is AI, Web3 will hype in future, yes I believe in you, thank you for telling the opportunity.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: udayantha11 on October 07, 2022, 07:43:46 AMAs per my experience, On 2018 Smart contract bubble came to altcoins , so all related to smart contract Alts became giants at that time. 2021 hot topic were Gaming,NFT ,Defi. I think for 2024/2025 hot topics will be " Web3.0 , AI, and Machine learning ". what is your thoughts?Only the guy with crystal ball can predict what you are asking because this is not a regular TA that you see the future trend by just looking at previous result. There’s a high chance that it will be related on Metaverse since it’s the year where Metaverse will be fully developed and innovate to new ideas inside them. I don’t know exactly what idea it is but I assume it will be an dapps inside a metaverse. Maybe a metaverse casino or anything else.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Web3 among other ones not known yet, i have seen the discussion of web3 constantly coming up in the crypto space. Recently, i attend a twitter space organized by guys from my country about web3 and crypto jobs, it was very insightful and educative. I think the most attention is on web3 and by 2023/24 there will be lots of web3, AI projects, there will also be some defi and cefi but they will be few. Already, we a handful of project support web3 in preparation for what is yet to come.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: web3 is likely to be famous in 2025 but maybe there are other unique things that will be famous besides that, we will not know because every year there is always something new we see in this crypto, so as long as the market is still bearish web3 or any project will go down too, I hope to see the crypto market recover soon to rediscover people's trust in this great technology of blockchain now or in the future

comments.author: XwWnu
comments.body: I think altcoin season 2025 will still be about the metaverse and maybe AI, because both are still very relevant, indeed for now because in the bear market there are a lot of metaverse coins such as MANA, SAND etc experiencing dumps, but if you are a new investor then my advice is to buy and hold until 2025 and I'm sure you will be surprised.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: udayantha11 on October 07, 2022, 07:43:46 AMI think for 2024/2025 hot topics will be " Web3.0 , AI, and Machine learning ". what is your thoughts?Web3 is what I think and then those two will be the next every cycle of bull run. I'm starting to see those projects that are focusing with web3 and they're thinking that it's the best time to start it because we're on the early phase of it. Although some web3 projects have already been there since the last bull run, still, it could be the next big thing where people are going to be hyped for. What else I can think of? Maybe about real companies producing their own tokens, like the ones that are already established.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Quote from: udayantha11 on October 07, 2022, 07:43:46 AMAs per my experience, On 2018 Smart contract bubble came to altcoins , so all related to smart contract Alts became giants at that time. 2021 hot topic were Gaming,NFT ,Defi. I think for 2024/2025 hot topics will be " Web3.0 , AI, and Machine learning ". what is your thoughts?Machine learning? seriously? i have seen bunch of machine learing projects dead. There's no reason for machine learning to become giants for the next years. People didn't even need machine learning to learn about crypto. They needs only consistently to read and read about crypto. Crypto can be learned easily without any problem. Ai is a bit make sense but so many ai projects were also failed delivering the product.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: There will be no big change as so many projects that got hyped in the past are still in the development mode. That means if you will be rarely seeing unique idea that can be implemented to the real life. Im sure that there will still be a lot of new projects with new idea but these idea was only gimmick that created by the developers to attract the demand since they know that if when they were repeating the same idea and it will give them all so many competitiors instantly that were working in the same thing.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: udayantha11 on October 07, 2022, 07:43:46 AMAs per my experience, On 2018 Smart contract bubble came to altcoins , so all related to smart contract Alts became giants at that time. 2021 hot topic were Gaming,NFT ,Defi. I think for 2024/2025 hot topics will be " Web3.0 , AI, and Machine learning ". what is your thoughts?AI and machine learning are the buzz words already being used. So I don't think people will fall for these buzz words again.For the next bull run there might be some new tech being developed which might be the next hot topic.If looking at current trends then web 3.0 and metaverse related projects might also shine in the limelight in the next bull run.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Generally in next bull run, next altcoin season, we will see next hot trends like- A new potential technological trend like in 2020 - 2021 we have DeFi 2.0, Decentralized exchanges, many new ecosystems ...- A new scam trend: with any new bull run, there will be more new scam projects that exploit a new trend to scam newbie investorsIn particular, I think security will be hotter in next few years. We see last few months there are more hacks and security attacks in crypto.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Im sure we will not need a new tech. The optimization from the current tech is good enough for the future. Just wanna try to tell you if metaverse seems to be the promising one. Facebook as a very big company in the world was starting to develop it. It takes time but yeah once it will be fully developed and then it will be making a very big movement for the world. You can do various things virtually through use the metaverse

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I think it is possible to be in that direction, because looking at the history, like with the Internet is a definitely one of the things that could be a game changer with web3.0. Maybe in the oncoming technology is to be invented it could bring more people in depending on what application you have. Time in the market would be hard, but as long as you think that web 3.0 can dominate the market, then maybe we could start accumulating now.

comments.author: kawetsriyanto
comments.body: Quote from: Sanni_w on November 25, 2022, 01:58:42 PMNobody can predict that but I think Metaverse is the next big thing in the crypto spaceOf course, no one really knows what the hot topics in 2025.However, I think it is no problem to predict them. The hot topics that may be the reasons for the next alt seasons are quite interesting to discuss.  Regarding Metaverse, it is not a new topic, it was already hyped in the previous bullish season. Unless there is something new about Metaverse, I don't think it will bring a big impact on the next altcoin season. I assume the hot topic in the next bullish season should be a new issue. We may be not aware of it now but it is probably hype during the upcoming bullish season.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: We still need to find out the hot topics in 2024/2025 because it's still two years away. For now, Gaming, NFT, Defi, and Web 3.0 can still become more popular in the next year. Still, there is no guarantee that they will become popular in another two years because we know that technology will be more advanced than now. And this is going to trigger something different in the crypto world. It's better if we enjoy the current topic while seeing the opportunities coming our way so we are not too late to join.

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: Many popular words have emerged in the market in 2024/2045, if a bullish season starts, the market does not revolve around a single popular name, I think that almost all of them will rise. I think the future of blockchain is Metaverse and web3. Metaverse will change our lives completely, and those who adapt early will be able to earn more. Being an early user usually pays off. It wouldn't be bad to experience a few testnets.

comments.author: Luffygroove
comments.body: I have the same thought. I believe we saw a glimpse of it in 2021–2022. It's only because of the bear market that the hype and development have been stifled. If it's a bull market, then we must be partying right now with so many projects that claim themselves as "Web 3 this" and "Web 3 that." Just like during the rainy season, it must grow like mushrooms. I think Web3 makes sense because it's the continuation of NFT and metaverse successes in the past.
